column3: What does "transaction relay is requested from peers" mean? Shouldn't this say "true if transaction relay is enabled locally"? \n

Possibly - What the flag is used for is to specify in the version message whether we want to receive transactions (so whether transactions should be relayed _to us_), as well as in the network code whether we accept transactions. That we don't relay transactions is also true, but follows from that.\nMaybe the naming is confusing, but I don't know a better one either.\n
Maybe "true if we do not want to send or receive transactions"? But consider it a nit, I am not a native speaker ;)\n
nit: why the "e" between the "x" and "s"?\n
